data.text: @RekomenByAsrul I watched it. Awesome for us 80s kids!
@RekomenByAsrul if this movie has no easter egg, "i know this character/ recognize this reference" impact whatsoever, can this movie stand on its own?

As at 31 March, READY PLAYER ONE goes straight to the top of my list of Top 10 Movies I've seen so far in 2018.

Go watch it at the biggest screen with the best sound system possible, preferably in IMAX 3D. I'd definitely would too, again!

#RekomenFilem https://t.co/ckKCOpdhKs

My favourite scene? The one when Twisted Sister's 'We're Not Gonna Take It' suddenly comes blaring. Rasa macam nak lompat tepuk tangan siot!

And yes, some of the best loved 80s classic songs are here too. Heck, the movie starts off with Van Halen!

Apart of being a jaw dropping VR adventure movie, READY PLAYER ONE is a loving homage to motion picture classics from Saturday Night Fever to The Shining.

And almost all your favourite movie and video game characters are here too. You'll have fun trying to spot them! https://t.co/orb5sctQeg
